item.description: 8.4.4 The Sum-product Algorithm Let us assume that all the variables in a model are discrete and hence marginalization corresponds to performing sums. To use the same algorithm for all kind of graphs, we first convert the original graph into a factor graph so that we can deal with both directed and undirected model using the same framework.
